page_title: Notifications - INFO6154 Machine Learning Optimization Strategies
content:
Notifications
Control how you receive notifications about activity in your courses. You can receive a periodic summary of activity, or receive instant notifications as things happen.
Contact Methods
Email Address
Send email notifications to: l_saraivatolentino@fanshaweonline.ca
Change your email settings
Summary of Activity
Email me a summary of activity for each of my courses.
How often?
Instant Notifications
Email
Activity Feed - new comments from others on a post
Enable Email for new comments from others on a post
Activity Feed - new posts created by others
Enable Email for new posts created by others
Announcements - announcement updated
Enable Email for announcement updated
Announcements - new announcement available
Enable Email for new announcement available
Content - content item created
Enable Email for content item created
Content - content item updated
Enable Email for content item updated
Content - content overview updated
Enable Email for content overview updated
Content Service - feedback for content service uploads
Enable Email for feedback for content service uploads
Discussions - mentioned in a discussion post or thread
Enable Email for mentioned in a discussion post or thread
Discussions - new post in a forum, topic, or thread that I subscribed to in instant notifications
Enable Email for new post in a forum, topic, or thread that I subscribed to in instant notifications
ePortfolio - feedback added to subscribed items
Enable Email for feedback added to subscribed items
ePortfolio - another user has subscribed to your updates
Enable Email for another user has subscribed to your updates
ePortfolio - feedback added to my items
Enable Email for feedback added to my items
Grades - grade item released
Enable Email for grade item released
Grades - grade item updated
Enable Email for grade item updated
Quizzes - quiz due date or end date is 2 days away
Enable Email for quiz due date or end date is 2 days away
Submissions - submission feedback released
Enable Email for submission feedback released
Submissions - publish all feedback completion
Enable Email for publish all feedback completion
Submissions - submission due date or end date is 2 days away
Enable Email for submission due date or end date is 2 days away
Submissions - submission feedback updated
Enable Email for submission feedback updated
Customize Notifications
Allow future courses to send me notifications
Exclude Some Courses
You currently have no courses excluded.
Manage my course exclusions
SaveCancel
